snippet: The police in San Diego are investigating a huge midnight water-gun fight that caused an estimated $10,000 in damage to the historic lily pond at Balboa Park.
abstract: Police in San Diego are investigating a huge midnight water-gun fight that caused an estimated $10,000 in damage to the historic lily pond at Balboa Park.
lead_paragraph: The police in San Diego are investigating a huge midnight water-gun fight that caused an estimated $10,000 in damage to the historic lily pond at Balboa Park.

headline.main: California: Historic Lily Pond Is Damaged in Water-Gun Fight
